id.description: Unique identifier for the Notification record

to.description: List of actual email addresses to send to

targetEntity.description: The uuid of the recipient of this notification, either a library or vendor.

cycle.description: UUID of a cycle document, if notification contains offerings

offeringIds.description: Array of offering ids, for generating invoices for specific products

isFeeInvoice.description: If true, this notification is for oneTimePurchaseAnnualAccessFees, otherwise for the products themselves

batchId.description: If this notification is for an invoice this is the BatchID to display on the invoice

invoiceNumber.description: If this notification is for an invoice this is the invoice number to display on the invoice
